title: Loaders not working for nomic foundation/ hardhat packages
body:
### Version of Hardhat

^2.13.0

### What happened?

I have configured these loaders, but they are unable to work with the hardhat packages here. I tried multiple loaders in that attempt:
webpack.js 
module: {
      noParse: /browserfs\.js/,
    rules: [{
      test:  /\.js$, \.ts$, \.tsx$, \.jsx$\.(node)$/,
      exclude: /node_modules/,
      use: 'raw-loader' ,
      use: 'node-loader',
      use: {
        //loader: 'babel-loader',
        loader: 'babel-loader',

      }
    },
    {
      test: /\.(node)$/,
      loader: 'babel-loader',
    },
  
  
  ]
    
  
  },
Error: 
Failed to compile.

./node_modules/@nomicfoundation/solidity-analyzer-win32-x64-msvc/solidity-analyz
er.win32-x64-msvc.node
Module parse failed: Unexpected character 'ï¿½' (1:2)
You may need an appropriate loader to handle this file type, currently no loader
s are configured to process this file. See https://webpack.js.org/concepts#loade
rs
(Source code omitted for this binary file)

Import trace for requested module:
./node_modules/@nomicfoundation/solidity-analyzer-win32-x64-msvc/solidity-analyz
er.win32-x64-msvc.node
./node_modules/@nomicfoundation/solidity-analyzer/index.js
./node_modules/hardhat/internal/solidity/parse.js
./node_modules/hardhat/builtin-tasks/compile.js
./node_modules/hardhat/internal/core/tasks/builtin-tasks.js
./node_modules/hardhat/internal/core/config/config-loading.js
./node_modules/hardhat/internal/lib/hardhat-lib.js

./node_modules/hardhat/internal/artifacts.js


### Minimal reproduction steps

1. npm install
2. configure hardhat and compile
3. utilize next. js
4. attempt to run to production using the next.js build
5. configure webpack including loaders
6. even with all packages installed, the error is produced
7. tried after several attempts, checked the node version, reinstalled packages, multiple attempts, and something not working with the packages in the nomic foundation files. 

### Search terms

webpack, hardhat errors, nomic foundation errors
